title: Survival Game (Unlimited) - Novel Updates
tags: Calm Protagonist   Clever Protagonist   Clumsy Love Interests   Cute Protagonist   Depictions of Cruelty   Enemies Become Allies   Family   Female Protagonist   Ghosts   Gore   Handsome Male Lead   Love Interest Falls in Love First   Modern Day   Mystery Solving   Older Love Interests   Popular Love Interests   Romantic Subplot   Secret Organizations   Smart Couple   Strong Love Interests   Survival Game   Unlimited Flow   World Travel

description:
When Yu Su opened an APP, her ordinary, boring, and constrained life changed in the blink of an eye.

An inescapable hotel, a hide-and-seek game of death…–One suffocating mission after another. Somehow, those missions were also related to reality...>
